core

Interface ResourceListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResourceAdapter

    public interface ResourceListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    The listener interface for receiving events from the resources. A resource event is generated when a request is sent to the resource or when a response is received.
    Author:
    Paul Chaignon

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onQueryRequest(Resource resource, java.lang.String fen)
      Called when a query has been sent to the resource to get a suggestions list.
      void onSuggestionsReceived(Resource resource, java.lang.String suggestions)
      Called when move suggestions have been received from the resource.
      void onSuggestionsUpdated(Resource resource)
      Called when move suggestions have been added to the resource.
      void onVersionReceived(Resource resource, int status, java.lang.String response)
      Called when a response has been received after a version request.
      void onVersionRequest(Resource resource)
      Called when a version request has been sent to the resource to know its version.
      void onVersionUpdated(Resource resource)
      Called when the version of the resource has been updated.

    • Method Detail

      • onQueryRequest

        void onQueryRequest(Resource resource,
                  java.lang.String fen)
        Called when a query has been sent to the resource to get a suggestions list.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource.
        fen - The FEN sent.

      • onSuggestionsReceived

        void onSuggestionsReceived(Resource resource,
                         java.lang.String suggestions)
        Called when move suggestions have been received from the resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource.
        suggestions - The suggestions received as a JSON document.

      • onSuggestionsUpdated

        void onSuggestionsUpdated(Resource resource)
        Called when move suggestions have been added to the resource. Happens just after the parsing from JSON.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource whose move suggestions have been updated.

      • onVersionRequest

        void onVersionRequest(Resource resource)
        Called when a version request has been sent to the resource to know its version.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource.

      • onVersionReceived

        void onVersionReceived(Resource resource,
                     int status,
                     java.lang.String response)
        Called when a response has been received after a version request.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource.
        status - The response status, an HTTP code.
        response - The response body: the version number.

      • onVersionUpdated

        void onVersionUpdated(Resource resource)
        Called when the version of the resource has been updated. Concerns the version and san parameters.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource.
